Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: Latin American Hot Borders is a documentary series on National Geographic that follows stressful and tough working days of Customs officers. The borders in Latin America separate one country from another and at the same time legal from illegal as well. The viewers will witness a battle against the crime that goes to the extreme. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: Latin American Hot Borders is a documentary series on National Geographic that follows stressful and tough working days of Customs officers. The borders in Latin America separate one country from another and at the same time legal from illegal as well. The viewers will witness a battle against the crime that goes to the extreme. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: The Border
programme.desc: Documentary series. National Geographic takes you on the front line of the USA's border control. Featuring various divisions of the United States Department of Homeland Security including ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) and Customs and Border Protection. We see how the professionals attempt to uphold the USA's immigration laws on the border and at other points of entry. Follow the Marine and Air Interdiction Agents, who patrol the Mexico–United States border; the most frequently crossed border in the world. Every day is a battle to stop illegal drugs, illegally imported goods, terrorists and other dangers from entering the country.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: In Somers Prison, Connecticut, Ronald Rutan, who is serving a 19 year sentence for burglary meets Frank Vandever, a former-stock broker and cross-dresser who is serving 40 years for murdering a former client. In spite of their differences, they share a common goal – getting out. They use their privileged positions working in the kitchens to smuggle in tools and evade security. They use Rutan's quiet recycling area to cut their way through window bars, disguising the cuts with peanut butter before cutting through the prison fences and making their escape. The cops spend more than two weeks struggling with hundreds of false leads looking for Vandever dressed as a woman; until they're given a tip off that the pair have checked into a motel. FBI agents arrive to bring them in – but not without a chase.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: Nazi Megastructures is a documentary TV series, a spinoff of the broader Megastructures TV series. It focuses on Nazi Germany's various military engineering projects during World War II. The series explores the artifacts of the powerful evil empire built to secure world's domination, and reveals dark engineering secrets of iconic Nazi Megastructures. To control nations and conquer the world, Nazi create huge terror machines, superguns and weapons of mass destruction. Take a look at the remains of most impressive megastructures that changed the world forever.

programme.title: A Gathering Storm
programme.desc: A major global series forming a unique view on the planet's fiercest storms, through the experience of people who work at sea inside the major hurricane zones of the world. Through extensive access agreements, hundreds of cameras are embedded on boats, ships and oil platforms. So as the storm approaches and the clock ticks down we are with the men who witness weather at its wildest, from all angles. All face different challenges, with different cargoes, deadlines and routes. At stake is the job, their cargo, their equipment... and their lives. We tell their greatest stories; the triumphs of engineering, ingenuity and sheer bravery that go along with working in storms at sea. Through their eyes we witness the rise of the storm. And we experience what it takes to get their job done in the face of nature's wildest weather. To explain what lies behind the unpredictability and danger unfolding on the ocean's surface, these first hand stories combine with scientific insight, analysis and satellite mapping. This dual perspective on one compelling story, brings together real human urgency and global weather science.

programme.title: Bloody Tales of Europe
programme.desc: From one of Rome's most feared Emperors to Hungary's Countess Dracula, BLOODY TALES reveals some of history's most infamous characters and events. In MONSTERS, Tudor historian Dr Suzannah Lipscomb and journalist Joe Crowley team up to investigate three extraordinary stories. Why did young Emperor Caligula with the Roman Empire at his feet rule through fear and madness? How did a decorated French war hero turn into a prolific child killer? And why did an aging Hungarian widow become known as Countess Dracula?

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how crispy, lip-smacking Kettle potato chips are specially crinkled for maximum dipping power; sweet, melt-in-your-mouth meringue cookies get their delicate texture in an unconventional oven; chewy oat flax dough and country-style strawberry jam join forces to produce an omega-rich, delicious and nutritious snack; and the makers of savoury Mediterranean flatbread bake an extra snappy, super crunch into each bite. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how an aromatic blend of exotic spices is packed into pakoras, a mouthwatering, deep-fried Indian fritter; the bakers of decadently custardy Napoleon bars fold thousands of tiny layers into flaky French pastry; fiery jalapeno peppers are added to a creamy, nutty hummus; and bold sea salt enhances the sinfully sweet flavor of irresistible caramel to produce a presidential bonbon. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Northern Ireland to take on a 1972 Generation 1 Toyota Celica a rare Japanese coupe that has seen better days. The car's owner is 50 year old Celica obsessive Noel who bought the car with a plan to restore it and use it as his daily driver. However Noel's whole life took a turn for the worse when he suffered a series of spinal injuries that lost him his job, his home and put his dream car restoration on hold for good.

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Strippers: Cars for Cash is a reality TV series revolving around two teams of car dismantlers competing against each other to find cars to buy, then break and sell the parts. The main aim is to make profit, so some outstanding selling skills and tactics are needed. All kinds of old rusty cars can be useful to their owners even if they are undriveable. Teams must play their cards right and just in three days find, dismantle and sell the part, the best wins the challenge.

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This week the challenge focuses on Japanese performance cars. A thriving parts scene exists and they want a slice of the action. Ben and Frankie find a battered Subaru Impreza to break and George and Sheldon take a fancy to a Mitsubishi in good nick but missing vital components. The question is who can make the most money on the parts from these Japanese superstars?

programme.title: Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Hosted by Phil Keoghan, National Geographic's flagship series Explorer investigates global stories of science, nature and culture. It is the longest-running documentary series on cable and recipient of 52 Emmy Awards, 13 Cable ACE awards, the Genesis and Peabody Awards, and twice nominated for Academy Awards. Newly reformatted as a weekly 1-hour magazine series, episodes air in 171 countries in 45 languages and supported by 440 million viewers.

programme.title: Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Phil Keoghan journeys to the Atacama Desert to visit Paranal Observatory. Mariana van Zeller heads to California to speak with members of the growing Flat Earth movement, and a group of volunteers trying to debunk their claims. Albert Lin explores a new frontier in human's ambition to travel to Mars – hibernation – and how lemurs can help. Cara Santa Maria explores the world of meteorite trading in Morocco and what it means for space research.

programme.title: Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Hosted by Phil Keoghan, National Geographic's flagship series Explorer investigates global stories of science, nature and culture. It is the longest-running documentary series on cable and recipient of 52 Emmy Awards, 13 Cable ACE awards, the Genesis and Peabody Awards, and twice nominated for Academy Awards. Newly reformatted as a weekly 1-hour magazine series, episodes air in 171 countries in 45 languages and supported by 440 million viewers.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: There's a special place in the heart of the Amazon rainforest with ecosystems so unique and biodiversity so rich the UN have declared it a World Heritage Site. But the threats of climate change are looming. If nobody takes action this pristine wilderness could wither in decades and the effects would be devastating, not only here but across the planet. Now a team of four courageous people have devoted their lives to the protection of this corner of rainforest. Braving an unforgiving jungle and extreme weather, they give us 360 access into the challenges, the setbacks and the successes of their everyday work.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: Could the Taj Mahal be in imminent danger? It is one of the grandest works of architecture on the planet. But these days, it has plenty of critics. They insist that this monument to undying love is at risk of collapsing into the river that runs beside it. But the conservators who guard it dispute the claims. We follow the controversy as two groups examine the Taj's stability. The over 360-year-old monument is under serious pressure from the effects of climate change, pollution and mass tourism. After the Mumbai attacks, security is also a serious concern. But could the Taj collapse?

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: What happens to us after we die? Where do we go? Is there any part of us that lives on? In the final episode of the series, Morgan Freeman sets out to understand humanity's obsession with the afterlife. He speaks to David Bennett, a man who died and came back to talk about it; Sam Parnia, a physician who is convinced something survives our physical bodies after death; archaeologist Jodi Magness, who reveals how one man's death granted humanity eternal life.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Violent cataclysms and fiery judgment fixate the popular imagination and fill numerous holy books. Morgan Freeman looks into this supposed future as well as past millennia of strife to determine how the world will end. His journey takes him to the desert that three faiths call home to pour over the Dead Sea Scrolls, and learn about the origins of the Jewish messiah. He decodes the enigmatic Mark of the Beast-666-in Rome, and sits down with a reformed Islamic terrorist. He travels to Guatemala to determine if the ancient Maya really predicted the end of the world, and learns from a psychologist why some people find comfort in catastrophes. On the brighter side, a visit with Hurricane Katrina survivors and a meditative session with one of the holiest men in all of Buddhism begins to realign Morgan's perspective-what if the apocalypse is not a planetary bloodbath, but rather a mental paradigm shift?

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Is there some sense of God that all religions share? How has the identity of God changed over the millennia? In an epic quest to understand humanity's millions of gods, Morgan Freeman embarks on a deeply personal investigation that will take him around the world. He'll go from a modern American megachurch bursting with tens of thousands of people to Hindu temples bursting with millions of gods. He travels from the Navajo Nation in New Mexico where a Navajo girl communes with her divine ancestors, to the mosques of Cairo where Muslims speak to a God that has no physical from. He discovers how Stonehenge in pagan Britain is connected to a renegade Egyptian Pharaoh and to the birth of Judaism. And thanks to a high-tech mapping of Morgan's brain, he'll find out if God has a mental footprint.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: In this episode of "The Story of God," Morgan Freeman traverses the globe to ask: Where did we come from, and what happened "in the beginning?" Humanity's first question remains one of its most intensely debated. For many believers, it is impossible to understand who and what we are without first understanding how we got here...and who (or what) is behind it. Were we created in the image of God, or are we the result of a 13.8 million year old singularity? Morgan meets with papal representatives at the Vatican and Islamic scholars in Cairo. He visits Hindu philosophers in India and archeologists digging up the ancient Mayan past in the rain forests of Central America.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to Dallas from Orlando, a private Learjet carrying pro golf legend Payne Stewart goes rogue. Air traffic controllers are unable to reach the crew, and as the plane continues its unplanned trajectory across the Midwest, it's obvious that something has gone terribly wrong. Air Force F-16 fighter planes scramble to intercept the Learjet, but the frosted windows and darkened cockpit and cabin add up to a shocking reality-the Learjet is now a ghost plane.

programme.title: Tracing Heritage
programme.desc: From the Himalayan foothills to the sprawling metropolis of Chongqing, Harry Yuan journeys along the upper reaches of China's Yangtze to see how the river has shaped life along its course for centuries. Join Harry as he learns how the waterway both aided and challenged communities to survive, and how it was once a highway of diverse goods and influences that gave rise to rich traditions still practiced today.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: The biggest cocaine busts from Airport Security Colombia and Peru. A man traveling to the DR, hides cocaine in children's organizers. A stepmom and daughter conceal bricks of cocaine inside jackets. A mother with a child carries cocaine in food packages and kid's clothes. The Anti-narcotics police find cocaine in a shipment of fresh herbs. A man going to Mexico with cocaine bricks in his carry-on. A man with liquid cocaine in beverage bottles.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: Stories of suspects who almost got away from Airport Security Colombia and Peru. A farmer swaps his suitcase with an accomplice in the terminal. A man who ingested cocaine is able to board a plane, but through international police coordination, is apprehended at his destination. A man with capsules in his stomach holds out for 36 hours and must be released. His sister is arrested. Cocaine cargo has been chemically disguised to fool officials.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: Security officials at Lima, Peru's Jorge Chavez International Airport work non-stop to uncover smugglers. A man conceals cocaine in the structure of his suitcase. He breaks down when he tells his mother he's been arrested. A passenger to Spain carries drugs in unmarked food packages. A couple want to travel to Mexico with an unusual pet. A woman bound for Mexico fears she carries contraband disguised as a gift. Cocaine-contaminated olives.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Lima, Peru's Jorge Chavez International Airport, anti-narcotics police work hard to prevent drugs from moving out of the country. Agents race to locate a suspect, discovered in an unlikely location. An arrogant smuggler with an impregnated suitcase has double the expected load. A young man has ingested and taped drugs to his body. A case of addiction – but just to coffee. Cocaine hidden under a winter jacket. Mechanical parts conceal cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paolo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat: cocaine smuggling. Police arrest a woman carrying a load of small purses packed cocaine, but she claims she's innocent. When the agents bring in her boyfriend, she erupts in anger. Agents uncover 3 kilos of cocaine disguised as bleaching powder. A woman hides cocaine in her undergarments, but she may be carrying more elsewhere.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Freddy and Summer like each other a lot. So much so it's affecting their playing. The Austin Music Festival is coming up and it is Dewey's life-long dream to play it. The band audition, but they don't make it. Dewey is very disappointed, but he discovers his old band will be playing. It seems like he has to make a choice between School of Rock and his old band. The band support him in chasing his dream and his wish may finally come true.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Freddy is looking for a response from Summer after telling her how he feels. The band agrees to help Dewey save a local ice cream shop, but first have to get out of an escape room challenge Principal Mullins signed them up for.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: In Blue's Clues & You, beloved puppy Blue invites viewers to join her and Josh on a clue-led adventure to solve a puzzle. With each paw print, the viewer is inspired to interact with Josh and Blue to figure out Blue's Clues!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: Pony becomes a video game master, but when their friends are in danger Annie and Pony need to use their gaming skills to save them. When Pony thinks he turned into a unicorn, Annie uses him to raise money to save their sports court from closing.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: Annie can avoid detention if she can heal the principal's dying plant, but the plan goes awry when Pony becomes attached to it. Pony's half-baked plan causes Annie to lose one of her boots, which she desperately needs for a family photo!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Lego City Adventures is an American-Danish computer-animated TV series produced by The Lego Group. The series is set in the noisy sprawling LEGO City metropolis, where its down-to-earth characters live and work. Here you will meet the bravest firemen, the best policemen, the most attentive mayor and LEGO characters from all walks of life. They team up to stop a mysterious criminal, who causes troubles all around. Each LEGO City citizen can feel quite a hero and participate in the most amazing and unbelievable adventures in the city! If you find yourself there, you witness everyday incidents with a happy ending.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln purchases a kiddie pool, and things get out of hand when all 10 of his sisters want to use it. After noticing that none of his sisters share his interests, Lincoln attempts to mold Lily into his mini-me.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne discovers that each family member will perform for Hector's birthday, she turns to Sid for help. Ronnie Anne's attempts to bond with her cool older cousin Carlota lead to a prank war against the boy cousins.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When a fancy new grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete. Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lubra Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 4.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

programme.desc: 9.epizode. Grila sezona uzņem apgriezienus un aizvien vairāk cilvēku plāno nedēļas nogalēs pagatavot ko īpašu. Kas gan var būt kārdinošāks par grilēta ēdiena smaržu, kas virmo gaisā? Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: Zinātne tuvplānā
programme.desc: Šajā digitālajā laikā vajadzība pēc informācijas, ceļojot vai plānojot ceļošanu, ir daudz vienkāršāka. Šķietami viss, ko par kādu galamērķi varētu vēlēties uzzināt pieejams mūsu viedierīcēs. Ko mūsdienās cilvēki meklē tūrismas informācijas centros, ar ko nodarbojas speciālisti, kas tur darbojas un kā šie centri pielāgojas un attīstās šajā digitālajā laikā. Par šo tematu diskutēs Vidzemes Augstskolas Sociālo, ekonomisko un humanitāro pētījumu institūta (HESPI) pētnieks un ViA asociētais profesors Andris Klepers un Limbažu novada pašvaldības aģentūras LAUTA direktore Ilze Millere.

programme.title: Dubultie svešinieki
programme.desc: Filma stāsta par filmētāju no Ziemeļiem, kurš kopā ar fotogrāfi no Dienvidiem dodas uz svešu zemi. Tur mīt vēstures nogurdināti ļaudis un laiks tiecās sastingt, bet jebkura tikšanās ir greizais spogulis, lai ieskatītos pazīstamās acīs. Apvidus karte ir bezgalīga lasāmviela, kurā var ierakstīt arī savu stāstu.

programme.title: Uzrausim danci Valkā
programme.desc: Par godu 19.Latvijas tautas mūzikas svētkiem, 2016.gadā Valkas brīvdabas estrādē izskanēja dalībnieku dižkoncerts "Uzrausim danci Valkā". Koncertā uzstājās deju grupa "Dzirnas", Valkas ģimnāzijas jauniešu deju kolektīvs "Vendīgs" un Smiltenes Bērnu un jauniešu izglītības centra deju kolektīvs "Dadzīši". Uz skatuves kāpa arī pazīstamākās tautas mūzikas grupas. Koncerta pamattēma bija ceļojums cauri gadsimtiem mūsdienu muzeja noslēpumainās kolekcijās. Svētku radošā komanda ir instrumentālās tautas mūzikas eksperts Ilmārs Pumpurs, horeogrāfi Agris Daņilevičs un Dagmāra Leja, deju kolektīvu vadītājas Māra Leja un Vineta Skutāne, kā arī režisors Aivars Ikšelis un scenogrāfs Ivars Noviks.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Разрушители легенд
programme.desc: Каждый из выпусков "Разрушители легенд" посвящён двум и более городским легендам, распространённым убеждениям или слухам из интернета. Основной миф часто требует всесторонней подготовки и специального полигона для испытания; кроме него в передачу также включают один-два не столь хлопотных в плане подготовки и проведения мифа. Некоторые эксперименты оказываются настолько сложными, что им посвящается весь час, отведённый на передачу. Иногда для проверки целого комплекса связанных мифов выпуск длится вдвое дольше обычного. Ведущие Джейми Хайнеман и Адам Сэвидж больше 30 лет работали в сфере кинопроизводства (в области спецэффектов) Они были главными техниками в Звёздных войнах (например, программировали движения дроидов). Впоследствии они стали использовать свои обширные инженерные знания и богатый опыт конструирования для создания сложных механических устройств, используемых в проведении экспериментов. Они разрабатывают, собирают и используют эти механизмы в мастерской спецэффектов M5 Industries Хайнемана. Часто испытания проходят и в других местах Сан-Франциско и его окрестностей, в том числе на бывшей военно-морской авиабазе в Аламиде, бывшей авиабазе ВВС "Хэмилтон" в Новато, на гражданском авиакосмическом полигоне "Мохаве Спейспорт", или в пустыне Мохаве, где проверяются мифы, связанные с ракетами.

programme.title: Высокие ставки
programme.desc: В Санкт-Петербурге совершается покушение на известного криминального авторитета, владельца подпольной сети казино — Юрия Сергеева. В происходящее неожиданно вмешивается случайный прохожий, который дает киллеру отпор. Преступник убит, а прохожий, которым оказался тридцатилетний Кирилл Борзов, недавно приехавший в город из провинции, получает от Сергеева предложение работать в его службе безопасности. Так Борзов попадает в мир азарта и порока. Каждый день на глазах главного героя разыгрываются настоящие драмы из жизни игроков казино и его обслуги.

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" – это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Дельта
programme.desc: Андрей Бекетов приехал в дельту Волги отдохнуть и навестить своего друга Павла Лобанова, работающего инспектором рыбоохраны. Когда-то они вместе служили в спецназе, потом Лобанов вернулся в родную деревню, а Бекетов ушел на работу в городскую полицию, но был оттуда уволен за излишнюю принципиальность…

programme.title: Чудны дела твои, Господи!
programme.desc: Андрей Боголюбов приезжает в провинциальный городок, чтобы занять должность директора местного музея. Вскоре вокруг него начинает твориться нечто странное и зловещее.

programme.desc: Žurnālists Armands Puče kopā ar viesiem diskutē par to, kā tiek virzīti procesi Latvijā un kā tiek pieņemti lēmumi, kas ietekmē visas Latvijas tautas dzīvi.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Būtu zinājis…
programme.desc: Daba lūdz, lai kļūstam pret apkārtējo vidi draudzīgāki un atbildīgāki.

programme.title: Globuss
programme.desc: Raidījums "Globuss" reizi nedēļā skaidro ārpolitikas un starptautiskās aktualitātes, no kurām izriet arī Latvijas politiskā, ekonomiskā, tautsaimniecības un kultūras pozīcija un pārmaiņas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau Jr., grandson of the legendary Jacques Cousteau, explores the most breath-taking places on the earth. Documentary TV series Xploration Awesome Planet takes you on incredible journey around our unique planet to experience its outstanding power and beauty. Philippe uses unbeatable combination of passion, deep knowledge and infectious enthusiasm to show us dynamic forces of earth, its miraculous wonders from the tops of the highest mountains to the depths of the oceans, various ecosystems, extreme weather, waterfalls and caves, geisers and glaciers, volcanoes and beaches of all colors of rainbow, various species of animals and birds and their habitats.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Super Human Challenge
programme.desc: Children's series. Join presenter Tim Fitzhigham as he scours the world for people with astonishing abilities and real life super powers. With help from his assistant Doctor Megan John, Tim challenges these extraordinary individuals to see just how super-human they are. From the arctic to the bottom of the ocean, Tim leaves no stone left unturned, and in his quest for super humans, he manages to find a man who can see with his ears! Prepare to be astounded as these science-defying men and women leave Tim lost for words. With extraordinary physical abilities and unbelievable stamina, Tim will need to all the help he can get from Doctor Megan if he is to stand a chance against these incredible human beings.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates this long awaited sequel to the first Blue Planet series. Returning to the oceans after nearly 2 decades, David Attenborough explores life under the seas, the day to day lives of the creatures that live there and the challenges they face from their rapidly changing environment which is affected more and more by humans every year. With a strong environmentalist message, the series promotes animal welfare and shows what the earth stands to lose if nothing is done about the current climate crisis. diving into every ocean on earth, a wide array of weird and wonderful animals are documented. Nature documentary series.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Super Human Challenge
programme.desc: Children's series. Join presenter Tim Fitzhigham as he scours the world for people with astonishing abilities and real life super powers. With help from his assistant Doctor Megan John, Tim challenges these extraordinary individuals to see just how super-human they are. From the arctic to the bottom of the ocean, Tim leaves no stone left unturned, and in his quest for super humans, he manages to find a man who can see with his ears! Prepare to be astounded as these science-defying men and women leave Tim lost for words. With extraordinary physical abilities and unbelievable stamina, Tim will need to all the help he can get from Doctor Megan if he is to stand a chance against these incredible human beings.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!
